name: Latios Prism Star
author: Anesaki Dynamic
flavor_text: It understands human speech and is highly intelligent. It is a tender Pokémon that dislikes fighting.

attacks.name: Dragon Fleet
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage for each of your Evolution {N} Pokémon in play.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Prism Star card with the same name in your deck. If a Prism Star card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.
